alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Phillips and south central Harlan Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 915 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodruff, or 17 miles north of Phillipsburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Phillips and south central Harlan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central Kansas.
